mapper.select: SELECT m.usercode,m.token,(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(),m.createtime) > 30 THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) flag FROM tb_upc_token m WHERE token = #{token};
mapper.update: update tb_upc_users set usercode=#{usercode}, username = #{username}, deptcode = #{deptcode}, deptid = #{deptid}, usertype = #{usertype}, telphone = #{telphone}, areacode=#{areacode}, parnter_name = #{parnter_name}, webchart = #{webchart}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, sex = #{sex}, certificateno = #{certificateno}, initials = #{initials}, receiver_area=#{receiver_area}, companyid=#{companyid} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: UPDATE tb_upc_users SET delstatus='1' where usercode in (${usercode})

SELECT u.*, d.companyid, e.deptcode AS laboratory_no, ( CASE WHEN (u.usertype = '1' || u.usertype = '0' ) THEN CONCAT("dept.companyid=","'", d.companyid,"'") ELSE ( CASE WHEN u.usertype = '2' THEN CONCAT("users.deptcode=","'", u.deptcode,"'") ELSE (CASE WHEN u.usertype='3' THEN CONCAT("ci.case_in_per=","'",u.userid,"'") ELSE CONCAT("ci.case_in_per=","'",u.userid,"'") END) END ) END ) sql_str
FROM tb_upc_users u LEFT JOIN tb_upc_department d ON u.deptcode = d.deptcode LEFT JOIN (SELECT deptcode FROM tb_upc_department WHERE islaboratory='Y') e ON u.deptcode = e.deptcode WHERE usercode = #{usercode} AND u.delstatus IS NULL
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.deptid) as deptListId FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_upc_users t WHERE t.`relation_id`=#{relation_id}) a GROUP BY a.relation_id
